S.FORM: Abdrabbuh Mansur Hadi u siwkay 9 bulad 1 demiad, Abdrabbuh Mansur Hadi, u misingkiway. 1945 a mihca nalecuhan u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Yemen ayza sa ci Abdrabbuh Mansur Hadi, micakat a demiad sa i 2012 a mihca 2 bulad 27 demiad. u ngangan niza u sulit nu Hulam: u sulit nu Alabo: u sulit nu Lipun: u sulit nu Amilika: Abdrabbuh Mansur Hadi u sulit nu Hulam 1970 .1990 .1994 5 10 3 .2012 . u sulit nu Lipun , , .2012 ,2015 3 , . , . . kakuniza malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
